title: Did Richard Branson say Trump spent two hours at lunch talking about revenge?
subtitle: The founder of the Virgin Group wrote that Donald Trump pledged "to spend the rest of his life destroying five people" who refused to help him.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The founder of the Virgin Richard Branson group said that years ago Donald Trump spent two hours at lunch pledging "to spend the rest of his life destroying five people" who refused to help him.
